a.title: Section A: Foundations and Basic Commitments
a.span: Section A: Foundations and Basic Commitments

a.title: Section B: School Board Governance and Operations
a.span: Section B: School Board Governance and Operations

li.a: Section A: Foundations and Basic Commitments
Section B: School Board Governance and Operations

div.p:
Covington City Public Schools welcomes you to a new school year. CCPS consists of Edgemont Primary School, Jeter-Watson Intermediate School, and Covington High School. The Faculty and Staff at each school welcomes all students, parents, and community stakeholders so that everyone partners together for success. The enhanced web presence and platform will bring our schools, students and teachers to the forefront of the 21st century.
CCPS is committed to “shaping the future” by ensuring that each student is a valued individual with unique characteristics and needs, who can learn when actively engaged in a positive environment of mutual respect, where student learning is the priority.

strong.style: color: rgb(255, 0, 0); font-family: Tahoma; text-align: center;

em.span: Governor Northam has ordered all schools closed for the remainder of the academic year.

a.title: Coronavirus Updates
a.style: font-family: Tahoma; text-align: center; font-size: x-large;

br.style: color: rgb(0, 32, 96); font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 13.3333px; text-align: center;

p.em: Covington City Public Schools is committed to providing online information access to everyone including persons with visual and hearing impairments. As such we are in the processof redesigning our web pages to allow for easy access to all users. Please let us know at 540-965-1400 or sfuhrman@covington.k12.va.us if you need assistance or have any issues accessing our web site.

br.em: The School Board is committed to a policy of nondiscrimination with regard to race, color, sex, age, religion, disability, national origin, or status as a parent. This attitude will prevail in all of its policies concerning staff, students, educational programs and services, and individuals and entities with whom the Board does business.

a.title: K Regis April 2020
a.style: font-size: large; font-family: Tahoma; text-align: center;
